abstract: After suffering heavy trading losses from bad mortgage investments, Bank of America said it was scaling back its investment banking operations and shedding 650 more jobs.
snippet: After suffering heavy trading losses from bad mortgage investments, Bank of America said it was scaling back its investment banking operations and shedding 650 more jobs.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said Tuesday that it was scaling back its investment banking operations, shedding an additional 650 jobs after suffering heavy trading losses from bad mortgage investments.

headline.main: Bank of America Curbs Investment Banking

abstract: Bank of America is scaling back its investment banking operations, shedding an additional 650 jobs after suffering heavy trading losses from bad mortgage investments.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is scaling back its investment banking operations, shedding an additional 650 jobs after suffering heavy trading losses from bad mortgage investments.

headline.main: Bank of America to Cut Investment-Banking Jobs
